UI-001.title: Add new href 'Forgot Password?'
UI-001.description: Add a 'Forgot Password?' link below the login form for users who need to reset their password

UI-002.title: Change the input field for password from type text to password
UI-002.description: Update the password input field to use type='password' for security and add an eye icon to toggle visibility

UI-003.title: The 'Login' button would change from transparent to green
UI-003.description: Update the Login button styling to use green background color instead of transparent for better visibility
